name: sEGGregate
description:
Your local farm called, they need your help sorting their chickens' eggs.  You reluctantly agreed, but little did you know, the chickens would start laying golden eggs. It's up to you to sort the regular and golden eggs to their specific cartons. Good luck and make sure you DON'T TOUCH THE BLACK EGG!

This game was made for Minijam 85: Gold, I had a lot of fun :D
